title: travelplanner: Could you help design a travel plan for two people leaving from Houston to Pensacola for 3 days, from March 6th to March 8th, 2022? Our budget is set at $1,400 for this trip and we require our accommodations to be visitor-friendly. We would like to have options to dine at Indian, American, Chinese, and Italian restaurants. We also prefer not to self-drive during the trip. (1ac1add32bdc57ed)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
Here is your travel itinerary for Pensacola:

## Flights
I've found several flights that fit your requirements:
- Flight F3855861 - Departure: 11:54, Arrival: 13:21
- Flight F3900892 - Departure: 16:45, Arrival: 18:16
- Flight F3901232 - Departure: 20:00, Arrival: 21:25
- Flight F3931162 - Departure: 09:33, Arrival: 10:59
- Flight F3994851 - Departure: 14:07, Arrival: 15:23

All flights are direct and take approximately 1 hour and 25 minutes. Flight F3855861 is the earliest and cheapest option, priced at $100.

## Accommodation
I recommend the following visitor-friendly accommodation options for your stay:
- Amazing apartment near museum, gardens & park! - $74 per night.
- Cozy 1-Bedroom Apartment 2 Blocks from the Subway - $339 per night.
- Charming 1-Bedroom Apartment in LES/Chinatown - $430 for your entire stay.

## Food
Here are some restaurant recommendations based on your preferences:
- Nukkad - Serves tea, coffee, American, and Italian food.
- Keventer's South Indian & Chinese Food - BBQ and fast food.
- Jain Coffee House - Cafe, Indian, Mediterranean, and BBQ.
- Blue Point Grill - French, Indian, Cafe, and Desserts.

## Attractions
Some attractions to consider visiting:
- Historic Pensacola Village - A historic area with museums and colonial buildings.
- Pensacola Museum of Art - Located in the historic district, offering a range of exhibits.
- Pensacola Bay City Ferry - Provides water transport and scenic tours.
- The Graffiti Bridge - A local landmark known for its street art.
- Seville Square - A public square with green spaces.

## Itinerary:
### Day 1:
- Morning: Arrive in Pensacola via Flight F3855861. Head to your accommodation to freshen up and drop off your luggage.
- Lunch: Try Indian food at Blue Point Grill.
- Afternoon: Explore Historic Pensacola Village and visit the Pensacola Museum of Art.
- Evening: Take a stroll along Palafox Street and choose from several dining options, including Nukkad or Keventer's South Indian & Chinese Food.

### Day 2:
- Morning: Start the day with breakfast at Jain Coffee House.
- Mid-morning: Visit The Graffiti Bridge and get some photos of the vibrant street art.
- Lunch: Enjoy a meal at Nukkad.
- Afternoon: Head to Pensacola Bay City Ferry for a relaxing boat tour and to see the city from a different perspective.
- Evening: Explore the Pensacola MESS Hall for a fun and interactive experience.

### Day 3:
- Morning: Have breakfast at your accommodation or a nearby cafe.
- Mid-morning: Check out the views at the Pensacola Lighthouse & Maritime Museum.
- Lunch: Sample Italian cuisine at Nukkad.
- Afternoon: Spend some time at Seville Square, enjoying the green spaces and soaking in the local atmosphere.
- Late Afternoon: Transfer to the airport for your return flight.

The total estimated cost for your 3-day trip, including flights, accommodation, and meals, is approximately $620-$1,120, well within your budget. Enjoy your visit to Pensacola!

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
